mapper.select: select province,count(*) as count from tb_user group by province order by count desc limit 8
select tr.role_name as name,count(*) as value from tb_user tu left join tb_role tr ON tu.role_id=tr.id where tu.role_id!=1 group by role_id order by value desc;

select distinct (select count(test) FROM tb_user where test>=90) c1, (select count(test) FROM tb_user where test>=80 and test<90) c2, (select count(test) FROM tb_user where test>=70 and test<80) c3, (select count(test) FROM tb_user where test>=60 and test<70) c4, (select count(test) FROM tb_user where test>=0 and test<60) c5 from tb_user
